text:
From suffering comes perseverance, from perseverance comes character, from character comes hope. 

As we approach Easter weekend, I am filled with hope. 

With #TexansHelpingTexans, we CAN conquer this #COVID19 outbreak together. https://t.co/4SBsrWrDMJ
